title: imac a1224 820-2347 Ghost Lcd
message:
Hi,
The screen became like this after we replaced its ssd. What may be causing this? 
There was no such problem before, also when connected by hdmi, it's normal.[ATTACH type="full"]59669[/ATTACH]

message:
i checked lcd cable, its working.

title: imac a1224 820-2347 Ghost Lcd
message: You should test with known good video cable and screen too.
